dao.name: QRY_CNTRY_RF
dao.statement: select rf.*,fmt.remark1 from cntry_rf rf left join ais_mail_fmt_mn fmt on fmt.mail_fmt = rf.mail_fmt and fmt.athena_id = rf.athena_id where rf.athena_id = ? order by contry_cod

dao.name: SEL_GHISTMNCONTRYCOD
dao.statement: SELECT CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_COD, CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_NAM, CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_SNA, LANG_RF.LANG_NAM, CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_COD||':'||CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_NAM CONTRY_DISPLAY FROM CNTRY_RF, LANG_RF WHERE CNTRY_RF.ATHENA_ID = LANG_RF.ATHENA_ID(+) AND CNTRY_RF.LANG_COD = LANG_RF.LANG_COD(+) AND CNTRY_RF.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id ORDER BY CNTRY_RF.VIEW_SEQ, CNTRY_RF.CONTRY_COD

dao.name: QRY_HFD_LIVE_COD_RF_CONTRY_COD
dao.statement: select contry_cod as value, contry_nam as display from cntry_rf where athena_id = ? order by contry_nam

dao.name: QRY_LANG_BY_CONTRY_COD
dao.statement: select lang_cod from cntry_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and contry_cod = :contry_cod
